WorkItem.ClosedComment: Removed problematic chart, as it is obsoleted by the built in Relative Stat Values.
WorkItem.Description:
Just as the title states. The problem can be reproduced even with just creating a default character. The view "Relative stat values" works, however.
 
Here is the exception dump:
 
System.IndexOutOfRangeException: Der Index war außerhalb des Arraybereichs.

WorkItem.Summary: [ShadowPriest] Throws exception when opening "Stat values" list

Comments.Message: Reproduced it here. Thanks for report, I'll make sure this chart goes away as its really obsoleted by the "Relative Stat Values" chart.
